title: kalai enna kalaiyE
sahitya:
kalai enna kalaiyE kalaik-karppanai tANDiya arputam kANADa 
kAsukku vilai pEshik-khaNDattil isai pEshum


anupallavi

  nilai enna nilaiyE enrum nilaiyAna nilaiyattil 
alaiyAdu nillAda pada nI paramA sabhApati ennAtha


caraNam    kaN enna kaNNE manak-kaNNinArk-kaNNanaik-kaNDu kalakkAda
paN enna paNNE shuddha paramAtma shakti aruLaip-paravAda 
paNNenna paNNE uLLE eNNiyurugip-pErinbam parugAda eNNeNNa eNNE
